title: Bacterial biopesticides: Biodiversity, role in pest management and beneficial impact on agricultural and environmental sustainability
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Preety Tomar, Neelam Thakur, Samiksha Jhamta, Sohini Chowdhury, Monit Kapoor, Sangram Singh, Sheikh Shreaz, Sarvesh Rustagi, Pankaj Kumar Rai, Ashutosh Kumar Rai, Ajar Nath Yadav
